subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: I. K. Kim birdied the first four holes on the back nine and shot a seven-under 65 to take the first-round lead in the L.P.G.A.’s Portland Classic in Oregon.
snippet: I. K. Kim birdied the first four holes on the back nine and shot a seven-under 65 to take the first-round lead in the L.P.G.A.’s Portland Classic in Oregon.
